content: I would like to be able to switch easily between threads, even if they are not in the same stream. Is it possible to get the list of thread for two or more stream at the same time? Or is there another way to navigate between streams?
if you select "all messages" you can see multiple streams simultaneously, although you may have to selectively unsubscribe to not get overloaded with messages
Interesting! I'm not sure if it fits my use-case, though (I may need to see more context to each conversation).
I usually use "all messages" to see active conversations and click on the topic header of the one I'm focusing on to see more context
